test-case.name: ApplyingADiscountCode
test-case.output:
Unknown browser - starting chrome Given I have added an item to the cart On shop page. On cart page. -> done: ECommerceSteps.GivenIHaveAddedAnItemToTheCart() (3.1s) When I apply the coupon 'edgewords' on the cart page -> done: ECommerceSteps.WhenIApplyTheDiscountOnTheCartPage("edgewords") (0.1s) Then the correct total cost is calculated The Expected discount is: 5.2500, the actual discount found was 3.50 NUnit.Framework.AssertionException: Discount is not 15% Expected: True But was: False
at NUnit.Framework.Assert.ReportFailure(String message) at NUnit.Framework.Assert.ReportFailure(ConstraintResult result, String message, Object[] args) at NUnit.Framework.Assert.That[TActual](TActual actual, IResolveConstraint expression, String message, Object[] args) at uk.co.edgewords.ecommerceprojectfinal.StepDefinitions.ECommerceSteps.ThenTheCorrectTotalCostIsCalculated() in C:\Users\BillyKeates\source\repos\uk.co.edgewords.ecommerceprojectfinal\uk.co.edgewords.ecommerceprojectfinal\StepDefinitions\ECommerceSteps.cs:line 76 The expected total is 33.7000, the actual total found was 35.45 NUnit.Framework.AssertionException: Multiple failures or warnings in test: 1) Discount is not 15% Expected: True But was: False
2) Total price is not correct Expected: True But was: False
at NUnit.Framework.Assert.ReportFailure(String message) at NUnit.Framework.Assert.ReportFailure(ConstraintResult result, String message, Object[] args) at NUnit.Framework.Assert.That[TActual](TActual actual, IResolveConstraint expression, String message, Object[] args) at uk.co.edgewords.ecommerceprojectfinal.StepDefinitions.ECommerceSteps.ThenTheCorrectTotalCostIsCalculated() in C:\Users\BillyKeates\source\repos\uk.co.edgewords.ecommerceprojectfinal\uk.co.edgewords.ecommerceprojectfinal\StepDefinitions\ECommerceSteps.cs:line 88 On My Account page Test finished. -> done: ECommerceSteps.ThenTheCorrectTotalCostIsCalculated() (2.8s)

failure.message:

test-case.name: RecievingAnOrderNumber
test-case.output: Unknown browser - starting chrome Given I have added an item to the cart On shop page. On cart page. -> done: ECommerceSteps.GivenIHaveAddedAnItemToTheCart() (3.0s) When I go through the checkout process On Checkout page. -> done: ECommerceSteps.WhenIGoThroughTheCheckoutProcess() (2.2s) Then I will recieve an order number Order number is 5939 On My account page. On My account => orders page. Order number 2 is: 5939 On My Account page Test finished. -> done: ECommerceSteps.ThenIWillRecieveAnOrderNumber() (3.7s)
